name: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 3
name_original: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 3
description:
Lead your SEAL Fireteam in an action-packed special op hunt for weapons of mass destruction and an ex-KGB agent in SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 3 for PSP®. Execute a crucial mission of national security involving realistic military action, tactics and teamwork wherever and whenever you want.
Multi-player and all online features for this product are no longer available.
SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 3 © 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. The U.S. Navy provided technical assistance, but does not endorse this product. "SEAL" and the SEAL Trident design are registered trademarks of the Department of the Navy and are used by permission.
Use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not use this item.
Multi-player and all online features for this product will be terminated and will no longer be available on 08/31/2012
